name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a member of the WebtrES club. With its classic box design, cat-shaped buttons, hand-down arms and legs, and a classic screen, RetroBot brings a nostalgic touch to the world of robotics. Its stylish shades add a cool and unique feature to its appearance. RetroBot is equipped with various abilities and skills, making it a versatile and valuable member of the WebtrES club.
